Heist Join Time.label: Time to join heist (seconds)
Heist Join Time.tooltip: How long chat has to join the heist before the heist starts.

Heist Cooldown.label: Time for heist to refresh (seconds)
Heist Cooldown.tooltip: How long after a heist before chat can heist again.

Heist Payout.label: Payout
Heist Payout.tooltip: The total payout of the heist will be the in put of the viewers times this value.

Fish Minimum Value.label: Minimum fish payout (channel points)
Fish Minimum Value.tooltip: The minimum amount of points a viewer can get for catching a fish.

Fish Maximum Value.label: Maximum fish payout (channel points)
Fish Maximum Value.tooltip: The maximum amount of points a viewer can get for catching a fish.

Fish Catch Chance.label: Catch Chance ( % )
Fish Catch Chance.tooltip: The percentage chance a user has of catching a fish during the event.

Fish permission.label: Start/stop event.
Fish permission.tooltip: The users that can start and stop the fish events.
